job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Web Developer/Senior App Developer/Web Developer/App Developer (at the rank of IT Manager/IT Officer)
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ideate, architect, and deploy AI-centric solutions.

   * Work closely with teams to design and implement AI-driven Web / Mobile Applications and Tools.

   * Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance. Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments.

   * Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web / Mobile and AI technologies.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Web Developer/Senior App Developer/Web Developer/App Developer (at the rank of IT Manager/IT Officer)

* Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ideate, architect, and deploy AI-centric solutions.

   * Work closely with teams to design and implement AI-driven Web / Mobile Applications and Tools.

   * Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance. Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments.

   * Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web / Mobile and AI technologies.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on web and app development with AI as a component, rather than core AI engineering. It lacks specific details on AI model development, training, or advanced generative techniques, making it difficult to classify as an ML or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ideate, architect, and deploy AI-centric solutions.
Work closely with teams to design and implement AI-driven Web / Mobile Applications and Tools.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand how AI solutions fit into the broader business context and translate business needs into technical requirements for AI-driven applications.

phrases: design and implement AI-driven Web / Mobile Applications and Tools.
rectify issues in both production and UAT environments.
job_tasks.justification: The core of the description revolves around developing, deploying, and maintaining web and mobile applications, which falls under traditional software development, even with an AI focus.

phrases: Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance.
Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves maintaining systems and rectifying issues in production and UAT, which aligns with operational aspects, though it's framed more broadly than specific MLOps.

soft_skills.justification: Explicit mention of collaboration with different teams.

phrases: Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web / Mobile and AI technologies.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates a need to keep up with evolving technologies.

phrases: Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments.
soft_skills.justification: Focuses on identifying and fixing problems in live environments.
